price: 147. Ir Mes nusiuntėme jį pas šimtą tūkstančių (žmonių) ar net daugiau
arabic: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِاْئَةِ أَلۡفٍ أَوۡ يَزِيدُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-arsalnāhu ilā mi-ati alfin aw yazīdūna
